name: windows-background-changer
description: A node library to change Windows wallpaper using a native C# executable.

scripts.build:native: dotnet publish native/WallpaperChanger/WallpaperChanger.csproj -c Release -o bin/ --runtime win-x64 --self-contained true /p:PublishSingleFile=true /p:PublishReadyToRun=true /p:EnableCompressionInSingleFile=true
scripts.build: npm run build:native && npm run build:ts
